text: CIIT College of Arts and Technology (Formerly known as Cosmopoint International Institute of Technology) a private institution founded by Niel Dagondon in Quezon City, Philippines. It offers programs related to programming, media and visual arts, and animation to an industry level. == Academic Programs == === Bachelor's Degrees === * Multimedia Arts * Computer Science * Entertainment and Media Computing * Entrepreneurship (New) * Information Systems (New) === Senior High School === * Computer Programming * Media and Visual Arts * Animation * Accountancy and Business Management (ABM) (New) Category:Colleges and universities in the Philippines
title: CIIT College of Arts and Technology
